data.name: Make Sail - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Make Sail's original soundtrack by Clark Aboud.

Over an hour of strings, harps and flutes will lift you up and wash you away on a voyage both intense and peaceful.

1. Making Sail
2. Introduction
3. Blueprints
4. Rough Waters
5. Mapping Out a Course
6. Night Journey
7. Ronne
8. Upwind, Upgrade
9. Dread Not
10. Sinking Outside the Box
11. Jellyfish
12. Island To Island
13. Many Pieces, One Boat
14. Tower
15. Overboard
16. Twin Sails
17. Zig Zag
18. A Swell Time
19. Building
20. A Sign Of The Chimes
21. Sailing by Lantern Light
22. Sailing / Edge of the Storm
23. Day Into Night
24. Returning
25. A Ring Of Storms
26. Pathfinder's Home
27. Bonus - Original Suite

Total Time 1:06:09


Files are in MP3 format.
